name: SkyMaze (Prototype)
description: This is a prototype of a game I'm working on called SkyMaze. The concept of the game is that you are traveling through a series of difficult to get through mazes where the walls are the real danger, as well as spikes. Oh, and did I mention the fact that the only way to traverse is to move your mouse? Anyway, there are only 3 levels so far, and most likely a  lot of bugs. This was meant to be a game jam game but I was busy and missed the deadline. Anyways, have fun!
